sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-dialog
            model-value="dialogVisible"
            title="答题"
            width="40%"
            @close="handleClose"
    >
        <el-table :data="tableData" stripe style="width: 100%">
        </el-table>
    </el-dialog>
</template>

<script setup>
import {defineEmits, defineProps, ref, watch} from "vue";
import axios from "@/util/axios";

const props = defineProps(
    {
        id: {
            type: Number,
            default: -1,
            required: true
        },
        dialogVisible: {
            type: Boolean,
            default: false,
            required: true
        },
        surveyQuestionIds: {
            type: String,
            default: "0",
            required: true
        }
    }
)
watch(
    ()=>props.dialogVisible,
    ()=>{
        let id = props.id;
        if (id !== -1 && props.dialogVisible === true) {
            initData(props.surveyQuestionIds);
        }
    }
)
const tableData = ref([]);
const emits = defineEmits(['update:modelValue','initList']);
const initData = async (surveyQuestionIds) => {
    var questionIdList = surveyQuestionIds.split(',');
    let questionList = questionIdList.map(
        async (item) => {
            console.log(item)
            let res = await axios.get('/api/survey-question/one/' + item);
            let question = res.data.data.surveyQuestion;
            console.log(question)
            return question;
        }
    )
    tableData.value = questionList;
}
const handleClose = () => {
    emits('update:modelValue', false);
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
